title: The coronavirus rumor mill
description:
Can we stop the spread of coronavirus misinformation on social media?

FEATURING
Eater's Matthew Kang @mattatouille
The Verge's Russell Brandom @russellbrandom

LINKS
Coronavirus Scare Rips Through LA’s Koreatown Amid False Social Media Rumors

Trump’s reckless coronavirus statements put the entire US at risk

Host:
Allegra Frank @legsfrank

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
